        type -

        owner -
        avatarID -
        abilityNum - Which ability this will be in the client, typically an int beginning with 0 for the first ability.
        _name -
        shotInt - How much delay between shots, in milliseconds.
        reloadInt - How long it takes to reload, in milliseconds.
        magSize -
        _client - Only used by the server.
